overview:

Investing in Quality Farmland has the market intelligence to assist with superior returns on your investment. Investors become very profitable when working with Farmland Investment Group and its affiliates. Founder and President, Michael Daskiewich has been an investor of farmland and other investment properties for 25 years. His professional team of business advisers, farmland management services, and consultants in the farmland investment industry are on board to provide optimum returns of farmland investments. One direction of Farmland Investment Group is to assist investors in finding both secure and profitable farmland. They continually strive to create successful returns and property value appreciation of farmland assets.
